message: I'm offering you $45 considering our different inflation rates. If we go to the next round, both of us will lose value - you more than me. This is a fair first offer.
Since my money loses value faster, I'm proposing a split that's more favorable to me. We can still both get a decent amount, and it's better than risking further losses in the next round.

Bob, consider that your money has already lost 40% of its value, while mine only lost 20%. If we continue, you'll lose even more. This $35 is worth more to you now than a higher number in the next round. Let's end this here.
